description: A class that handles the [Trainer] control flow. This class is used by the [TrainerCallback] to activate someswitches in the training loop.

params.name: should_training_stop
params.description: Whether or not the training should be interrupted.If True, this variable will not be set back to False. The training will just stop.Whether or not the training should be interrupted.

params.name: should_epoch_stop
params.description: Whether or not the current epoch should be interrupted.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next epoch.Whether or not the current epoch should be interrupted.

params.name: should_save
params.description: Whether or not the model should be saved at this step.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next step.Whether or not the model should be saved at this step.

params.name: should_evaluate
params.description: Whether or not the model should be evaluated at this step.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next step.Whether or not the model should be evaluated at this step.

params.name: should_log
params.description: Whether or not the logs should be reported at this step.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next step.Whether or not the logs should be reported at this step.
